title: ping changes? the eff??!!! someone help!
body: okay...so i have been playing league for awhile now and ive always played on about 33 ping (50 on a bad day) and recently my league has been really high ping for absolutely no reason. ive checked my internet speed and provider, my computer parts, even my computers settings and as of two days ago my natural in-game ping is 120. it is absolutely atrocious and it makes me not even want to play because out of nowhere my ping spikes to 500 and i just glitch slide around the map and feed. eventually i DC and it makes league more frustrating than it already can be. the toxic league players all report and its just going to cause me to get a ban or some negative feedback from riot that isnt my fault.  if anyone else is experiencing this problem please contact me in game. feel free to add me. please help lol

replies.body: If you're seeing ping spikes and fluctuations, I'd recommend checking out our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) which help to identify where the issues are occurring as well as some solutions to the most common causes of connection troubles.  Lemme know if it helps!

I've been having the same issue today. all of the sudden I went from a steady 47 ping to a total disaster of high ping variance and high packet loss. I uploaded my logs but all their suggestions for fixing the issue were unhelpful- I always keep other programs closed, I already tried restarting my router and computer, and my wireless connection is perfectly fine and there haven't been any issues until today

I am having ping issues as well. It is normally around 41 but it is currently around 180-200 with fluctuations. There is something wrong on Riot's end as my net is in the best state it has ever been in, and my ping is fine everywhere else.
